title: Interpretation of a cloak in a dream. A cloak in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a corset in the dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman dreamed of wearing the new torn and torn abaya to buy Ibn Sirin’s black abaya. The paper is a symbol of a woman of high rank, so whoever dreams of wearing an apron or wearing an apron, this symbolizes a benefit he will gain from a good and kind woman. Seeing the scarf is a symbol of a woman of high rank. Red symbolizes the emergence of hostility or competition and quarrels because of women. Seeing an unmarried girl or an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes her share and good luck. The hijab symbolizes the good that this girl will receive in the future. Seeing a girl wearing a scarf indicates that her future will be good, if The envelope is white or green. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream covered with a blanket heralds her marriage in the summer of this year, if this wrap is bright white and clean. Seeing an unmarried woman as if she cannot see her legs from the edge of the envelope because of the length of the envelope, symbolizes a little luck and a lot Of satisfaction. For a single girl to see as if washing and cleaning a towel indicates her benefit or benefit. A white towel in a dream symbolizes a good or generous person. It is repulsive to see black sadness in a woman’s dream because it symbolizes hatred, enmity, and hatred. A married woman sees a wrapper in her dream. The cover in a married man’s dream directly symbolizes the husband, as the husband is his wife’s cover and cover. Seeing a married woman wearing an apron in a dream means sustenance and kindness. The white cover symbolizes protection and well-being, and wearing it symbolizes blessings, health, cover, kindness, and money. Seeing a silk scarf means good luck and happiness in life. Things of the future, God willing. Seeing a scarf made of wool, linen, or cotton is praiseworthy, especially if its color is between light and pink. Seeing black fabric is not praiseworthy because it symbolizes insomnia, anxiety, distress, and sadness. The yellow scarf symbolizes sickness and illness, and the pink scarf or Red or purple expresses the strong and passionate feelings that fill the wife’s heart and fill her life with happiness. Seeing a new, clean towel symbolizes the renewal of life and hope after despair. Seeing a married woman sewing a torn or worn apron indicates her husband’s good condition. It can also indicate the end of disputes and problems between her and her husband. This vision in a divorced woman’s dream could indicate her husband’s response to her. A pregnant woman’s vision of a new blanket foretells the birth of a boy without a girl, and the best dream is for a pregnant woman to see herself wrapping her newborn in wraps and its color is white, as this symbolizes that the child will be born. Relationship in the future. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a green dress indicates her safety and the safety of her newborn and also indicates the good that will happen to the family and may also herald an easy and blessed birth, God willing. Seeing a pregnant woman cleaning a towel, sewing it, or dyeing it in a dream means that there will be Positive changes in her life, both in terms of families and money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about losing a prayer rug in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about losing a prayer rug in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about losing a prayer rug in a dream, one of the dreams that many wanted to know the interpretation of this vision, let us get to know the interpretation of some diligent interpreters, and the reader must be aware that it is the jurisprudence of scholars and not the jurisprudence of the site. Interpretation of a dream Losing a prayer rug in a dream. Losing a prayer rug in a dream may indicate the difficulty of achieving the desires and dreams that the dreamer dreamed of. If a person sees that the prayer rug is missing, this may indicate that he is not performing his duties and acts of worship and must seek help from God. Whoever sees in a dream that the carpet may indicate Some financial crises that the person having the vision may face in his life at that time, and God knows best. If he sees the loss of prayer rugs, this may indicate changes occurring in the life of the person having the vision during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an old carpet in a dream. An old prayer rug in a dream may It indicates some difficulties and problems that the person having the vision is facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. If one sees the old carpet in a dream, this may indicate some fears and problems that the person having the vision is suffering from in his life at that time and he needs to seek God’s help. It may A person’s dream of carrying old carpets in a dream indicates physical weakness felt by the dreamer or health problems he may face during this time, and God knows best. And if he sees old carpets in a dream, this may indicate that he was not feeling stable and happy at that time, and God knows best. I know. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a carpet in a dream. Anyone who dreams that he is cutting carpets can indicate many problems that were present in his life during those days and he must ask God for help. Seeing carpets being cut in a dream may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer faces in His practical life and he must seek help from God. Seeing yourself cutting carpets in a dream may indicate the family instability that the family is suffering from during this time, and God knows best. If a person sees himself cutting carpets, this may indicate that he has encountered some financial obstacles during This period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about washing dirty carpets in a dream: Washing dirty carpets in a dream may indicate the financial stability that the dreamer enjoys in his life during those days. If one sees that he is washing dirty carpets in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that will occur to the visionaries. In his life during this period, thanks to God. When a person sees that he is washing dirty carpets, this may indicate the psychological and material redundancy that the dreamer enjoys in those days, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet that sinks in water in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream can Carpets filled with water can indicate the abundance of chaos that exists in the dreamer’s life and he must seek God’s help. Dreaming about carpets being in water in a dream may indicate a material loss that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. Whoever sees

title: Interpretation of shoes in a dream for a girl. The meaning of seeing shoes in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of shoes, whether white, black, red, yellow, green, blue, flat heel, flat leather, for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a fiancée, to buy a new one, shiny, lost, old and modern, on the authority of a young man married to Ibn Sirin Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Sheikh Waseem Youssef, and others. Interpretation of shoes in a dream for a single woman. Interpreted by her husband, and her husband is determined by the color of the shoe. Black shoes are a sad, introverted man. Blue is a calm, shy man. White is an instinctive man and his nature. Green is a humble social person. Yellow is a man who loves fame and height. High heels with a little ostentation. Casual sandals for a popular man. Open toe, a little generous. And it is closed with a little slippery. A bright young man who loves praise and fame when he is young. Dusty and poor elderly people, and they may be old or very old. Meaning of shoes in a dream. If you dream that your shoes are broken, it means that there is something preventing you from traveling. And if you travel and wear shoes, if they are black, then the trip was for seeking. Money and I will pay. If it is red, then it is asking for pleasure. If it is green, then it is debt. If it is yellow, then it is an imaginary illness. If you wear your shoes and are walking in the dream, it means that you will travel by land. Interpretation of losing shoes in a dream: seeing the sole or shoe being lost or falling into the water. This is evidence that his partner is close to loss, and therefore he is safe from this destruction. Whoever sees that someone has stolen his shoes and clothes. This is evidence of someone deceiving his partner, and this deception is accomplished by foresight, seeing the shoe yard, then searching for it and finding it after getting tired. Evidence of asking for money and achieving it after being tired. Seeing that he is selling his shoes is evidence of the death of his wife. Silver shoes, this is evidence of the existence of a good and beautiful woman. Fire shoes, this is evidence of the tyranny of women. Shoes made of wood, this is evidence of a traitorous, hypocritical, and lying woman. Cowhide shoes. This is evidence of a foreign or foreign woman.Horse leather shoes. This is evidence of the presence of a nearby woman or Arab. Seven leather shoes; This is evidence of injustice. Comfort and an increase in his money. Shoes in the summer are evidence, but in the winter they are comfort and kindness. Shoes without wearing them are humiliating money. Interpretation of seeing shoes by Ibn Shaheen. To see shoes in a dream is evidence of travel or a woman. When you see yourself walking in a specific place wearing shoes, this is travel evidence. Seeing yourself wearing shoes and not walking in them is evidence of marriage to a woman. If the shoes are new, it is evidence of the woman’s virginity. Obtaining shoes or shoes from someone is evidence of marriage or obtaining a maid. Seeing him walking in a shoe and losing one of his legs and continuing to walk on one leg. One, this is evidence of the separation of a relative, such as a brother, sister, or partner, and this separation occurs either through death. Or travel, or divorce

title: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice for a single and married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the poetry of Ibn Sirin. We will explain to you through this article on the site a different interpretation of the dream about lice in hair by the scholar Ibn Sirin with evidence. The following: Ibn Sirin says that seeing lice in a dream without feeling bad is a sign that the dreamer will obtain a lot of good in reality. As for seeing lice on the dreamer’s head, if he is sick, this is a sign that the disease will multiply on him, and then it will end forever. Pulling lice out of the hair and then throwing them on the ground is a sign that the dreamer is going through a financial crisis, but will get out of it soon. Seeing a man with lice flying on his chest is a sign that the dreamer’s servant will leave his house, and if he has a son, this is a sign that this son is beyond his control. If In a dream, the dreamer sees many lice scattered on the floor, then this is a sign of the weakness of people who ask the dreamer for help. If in your dream you see white lice walking on your clothes, this means that there is someone who is deceiving you in your life and disturbing you. If one sees in his dream that there are lice On his old clothes, it means that he has money with another person and has no possibility of recovering it from that person. If lice causes pain or bites in the dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is exposed to many malicious people in his life who are trying to damage his reputation. Seeing lice is considered The white on the dreamer’s head is a sign that he will get rid of the problems and fears that surround him in reality. Interpretation of the dream of lice in the hair for a single woman. Explain to us the world, Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of lice in the hair for the single woman, and according to some important associations that can express the girl’s life on the ground and the events that take place In it, with the following details: Seeing lice in abundance in a girl’s hair in a dream is a sign of goodness and happiness for the girl in her coming days. The same vision could also be a sign that the dreamer is spending a lot of his money on trivial matters that have no real value. If the girl sees that she If she rubs her hair because of the presence of lice, this is a sign that she has many bad friendships and she must beware of them. The presence of lice in a woman’s dream can be evidence of the existence of many crises in the reality in which she lives. Lice in a girl’s dream may represent her reaching adulthood and delaying her marriage. Read also: What is the interpretation of a dream about long hair for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq? Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees in her dream that lice are coming out of her hair and spreading on her bed, this is a sign of goodness and a lot of money that will come to her in reality. The same vision can also be a sign that the dreamer will get rid of worries or problems in his real life. If the dreamer sees lice coming out of her hair and landing on her clothes, this is a sign that she will obtain a high position at work or that her husband will

title: What you did not know before about the interpretation of a dream about stealing shoes by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Stealing shoes in a dream is one of the visions that sometimes does not carry good interpretations, but if it is retrieved again, the meaning of the dream changes, so we will discuss it today. Interpretation of a dream of stealing shoes, according to what was narrated by great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Ghannam, and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream of stealing shoes by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream Stealing shoes? Stealing shoes in a dream is a bad thing. It indicates that the dreamer is a careless person who does not keep the things he has, so he will lose many important people in his life in addition to opportunities to improve his future. Seeing an attempt to recover stolen shoes is an indication that the dreamer is trying hard to become He is a good person and is trying to get rid of the negligence that leads him to lose people in his life. As for the one who sees shoes, the dream is one of the promising visions that indicate getting rid of difficulties and problems in the dreamer’s life and he will be able to achieve his ambitions and goals soon. Mainly stealing shoes in a dream means that the dreamer He will travel in the coming days. The dream expresses that the dreamer is currently suffering from a disturbance in his psychological state and that bad thoughts are controlling his thinking. Whoever sees himself stealing a silver shoe, the dream indicates a quarrel with a fortune teller close to him, and if he is married, the quarrel will be with his wife. Interpretation of a dream Stealing shoes by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees that he is stealing someone’s shoes, this indicates that he is committing many sins, and he must go to obey God and ask Him for forgiveness. If an unmarried woman sees that she is trying to steal shoes, this indicates her neglect in her religious affairs, and her preoccupation with the world and its pleasures. Interpretation Dream of stealing shoes for single women: Stealing shoes in a dream for a single woman indicates that she is a neglected person in her life, so she will lose things in her heart throughout her life. Stealing shoes and the thief was one of her friends, and it is a sign that she is being cheated and deceived by the people around her who represent love and friendship throughout Time. If the color of the shoe is black, this indicates that she will lose her current job and remain unemployed for a long time. Interpretation of a dream of stealing shoes for a married woman. Stealing shoes in a dream for a married woman and seeing the thief indicates that problems and difficulties are on her way and will negatively affect her marital life. Whereas if If the thief was her husband, the dream explains the many disputes and problems that will dominate her marital life, often leading to divorce. Stealing shoes for a married woman is an unexpected vision, as it indicates that her life will live in confusion, trials, and distress, and she must be patient until this passes. Period. In the event that the stolen shoe is returned to the married woman, this is one of the good things that indicates an improvement in her life. But if her shoe is stolen and she searches for it and finds it, the dream indicates that her husband will suffer from a health problem, but as the days pass he will recover completely and throughout this period she will stand Next to him. Stealing a married woman’s shoes and searching for them is evidence of the arrival of great blessings in her life and the improvement of her marital life. Interpretation of a dream about stealing shoes for a woman

title: Seeing a dead person in pain

preview.html: Seeing a dead person in pain. Seeing a dead person in pain in his leg. Seeing a dead person in general is one of the recurring visions that many people see in their dreams. Different interpretations of seeing a dead person in pain in his leg. Ibn Sirin says that the dead person appears in a dream sick, so perhaps this dead person did not do enough work. The good deed that frees him from the torment of the grave. Seeing the deceased in pain from his leg could be related to the misery and unhappiness that the dreamer is experiencing in that period of his life. Seeing the deceased in pain from his leg may be related to the dreamer being close to actually getting sick in the coming period. Seeing the deceased in pain From his leg may be an indication that the dreamer is cutting the uterus in his current life, and the dreamer must pay attention to the connection of the uterus. Seeing a dead person in pain from his leg according to Ibn Sirin. Dream interpreters believe that seeing a dead person with pain in his leg is related to the dreamer’s being affected by the worries and sorrows that dominate him. In the current period. The illness of the deceased in the dream may be related to the dreamer who is suffering from poverty or who will fall into some financial problems in the coming days. If the dreamer works in trade, then seeing a dead person near him sick in a dream may mean that this person will suffer losses. Significant financial distress in the coming days. The dreamer is an unmarried girl who sees a dead person sick in a dream. This girl may be late in marriage. Seeing the deceased in pain from his leg and parts of his body. Ibn Sirin believes that the appearance of the dead person tired in a married woman’s dream indicates multiple problems. Which this woman suffers from with her current husband. The illness of the deceased in the dream of a pregnant woman may indicate that this woman will be exposed to some health problems and crises during childbirth. The illness of the deceased in the dream of an unmarried and engaged girl indicates the multiple problems that existed between her and the engaged couple at that time. From her life. A young man who sees a deceased person tired may delay achieving the goals and objectives he seeks. Read also: Interpretation of dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The deceased’s illness in a dream with cancer may be a lack of debt on the dreamer’s part and a lack of commitment to performing duties and acts of worship that he must Consider it.Interpretation of a dream about a dead patient in the hospital: A dead patient in the hospital may indicate that the dreamer at this time has committed many wrong actions and deeds.

title: Interpretation of seeing rings in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Rings are a type of adornment that women usually wear, and they are made of yellow, white, or silver metal in addition to precious stones. Seeing rings in a dream is one of the desirable visions that foretells many good things if it suits him and looks beautiful, but if it does not suit him or he feels disturbed Of these, they bring him trouble and we will learn more about their interpretation. Seeing through this article.Seeing rings in a dreamDreaming about rings in general is a sign of strength and the ability to achieve goals, in addition to being a symbol of marriage and marriage soon for a single person, and a new ring represents renewal in life in general.Seeing golden rings in a dream for a man is one of the undesirable visions that It indicates humiliation and turmoil, in addition to his exposure to injustice from the authorities if he is seen wearing it. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that a golden ring in a man’s dream without him wearing it is good news for a child who will come to him soon. Seeing rings in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing rings in a man’s dream that it is A sign of many responsibilities in life. Holding on to it means being able to think well. If the ring contains precious stones, it is an expression of fatigue, but it will take a lot from behind. Seeing diamond rings indicates fatigue and great effort to achieve a worldly cause, while silver It is a sign of self-competition to perform acts of obedience and get closer to God. Obtaining a gold ring as a gift indicates a new duty and responsibility for a man, while finding it from one person indicates an engagement and soon marriage. Seeing rings in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Kathir believes that rings In a virgin girl’s dream, it is a sign that she will soon marry a good man with whom she will live happily and happily, and if she is a student, then it is a sign of success, distinction, and privilege. Good luck, may God grant you success. Buying a ring made of silver is a symbol of stability, happiness, and a lot of luck in life, while a ring made of ruby ​​is news of a marriage to a prominent person in society. Seeing rings made of gold, according to Ibn Shaheen, is undesirable if It is not worn, this is evidence that you are going through a difficult time or hearing sad news, but it will soon disappear. A narrow ring in a dream for an unmarried woman expresses the bad morals of the person associated with it, and she must leave it so as not to harm her. Seeing rings in a dream for a married woman, jurists say Seeing rings in a dream for a married woman as a gift from her husband is a sign of pregnancy if she thinks about it, but if she sees that she is saving her, it is a sign of happiness and obtaining a lot of money. That will transform her life for the better. Seeing yellow gold in the home is an expression of problems and troubles in life, in addition to loss and loss of money. Breaking the wedding ring or removing it from the married woman, Ibn Shaheen interpreted it as separation between her and the husband, and she must try to reconcile And do not destroy the house. Seeing rings in a dream

Seeing rings in a dream

title: What is the interpretation of golden bracelets in Al-Osaimi’s dream?

preview.html: Gold bracelets in Al-Osaimi’s dream. The dream of golden bracelets is considered one of the most common dreams that many girls and women see, which prompts them to search for an interpretation of this dream. The vision of golden bracelets in a dream varies according to the social status of the viewer, and the interpretation varies according to whether the dreamer gives them as a gift or He takes them from someone, and in the hand with which he wears them and other things.Gold bracelets in a dream Al-Osaimi bin Serena Gold bracelets in a dream Al-Osaimi Seeing gold in a dream generally indicates that the dreamer has a lot of money and wealth and is close to achieving his dreams and goals.Gold bracelets in a dream, according to Imam Al-Usaimi, are visions that do not bode well and symbolize the state of depression and psychological deterioration that the dreamer will suffer from, and he may fall into a disaster or fall under the rule of an unjust person. If the dreamer sees that the gold bracelets have changed to silver, the dream indicates the great loss and bankruptcy that this person will be exposed to in the coming days. When the dreamer sees that he is wearing gold bracelets on his feet, this is a sign of his fear and fear of something, and he may be imprisoned. This matter or captivates him. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Golden bracelets in a single woman’s dream. Seeing golden bracelets in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes that she is an independent girl who does not misbehave. And that there is a lot of goodness and livelihood on her way. Also, seeing golden bracelets in a dream is an indication that her wishes and desires will be fulfilled and that her next life will be filled with joy and happiness. Interpretation scholars have gathered that seeing the previous dream in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign for her that she will get married. Close to a wealthy and well-to-do young man. If she sees herself wearing these bracelets on her hands, this is a sign that she will achieve great success on the educational and academic level, but if she sees herself buying gold bracelets, this indicates that she will get them. The first steps in her new life. Gold bracelets in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees golden bracelets in a dream is an indication that she is a moral and distinguished person due to the purity of her heart and that she fears God in all her actions and her closeness to Him. Also shown in the dream of a married woman is the abundant sustenance that she will receive. And that all her money and power will come from legitimate sources and she will receive a lot of sustenance and blessings in her life. To dream that her gold bracelets fall and she loses them, this is evidence that she is surrounded by a group of cunning and envious people who want to set her up and harm her. If she sees that her husband is giving her bracelets, this indicates On how stable she is in her life with her husband, and that he loves and appreciates her, and that she will become pregnant soon. Gold bracelets in a dream Al-Osaimi Pregnant Seeing gold bracelets in a pregnant woman’s dream, as interpreted by Imam Al-Osaimi, explains that she will give birth to a son and he will be a good son who will be loyal to her and his father and will get

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake chasing me

preview.html: It is interested in searching for interpretations and meanings of this vision, and through this article we will learn about it and explain it more through the Mufsir.com website. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for one girl. Seeing in a dream an unmarried girl running on a black snake in her bed. This is evidence that she did not follow the teachings of her religion. And her legal controls while sitting with her fiancé. If she does forbidden things and angers her Lord, then she must repent and avoid these actions so that she does not fall into more sins and disobedience. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees a black snake biting her neck in a dream, it is a sign that she will be raped by strangers who They take good care of her. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees a black snake in her dream, she is not afraid and confronts it. This indicates that her character is strong and she can stand up to anyone who tries to violate her rights. If an unmarried girl sees that she befriends and loves the black snake and is not afraid of it In the dream. An indication that he is emotionally connected to a person known for evil and is misleading her about his love for her. But he is trying to harm her, so this vision is a warning to her, so she must warn him and avoid him so that he is safe from his harm and is fine, God willing. The black snake in the girl’s dream indicates that A married woman might expect one of her relatives to try to harm her. He must warn them well and not trust anyone easily so that he can be saved from their evil and harm. A black snake biting an unmarried girl in a dream is an indication that she will be harmed and that her enemies will be able to do so. The black snake symbolizes The dream of an unmarried girl refers to her wisdom and confidence in her mind a lot when making her own decisions. See also: Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a married womanThe black snake in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of someone who feels jealous and hateful towards her life and wants to take away the blessings that she has. Live it. And to beware of those he deals with and does not trust easily so that he does not fall into their harm. A black snake bites a married woman in a dream. It is an indication that in the coming days he will be exposed to problems, crises, and obstacles, and he will have a good time, God willing. A married woman killed a black snake in a dream, which It indicates that she will be able to get rid of an enemy who was trying to harm her without harming her. A black snake for a married woman in a dream may indicate a mean-spirited friend who is jealous of her life and wants to destroy her home. He must take care of her so that she does not fall into problems that lead to divorce or separation from Her husband. If a married woman dreams that a black snake is trying to bite her husband. She tries to keep the snake away from her husband and kill him so that no harm will come to him. This is a sign that some problems and crises will occur and she will stand by his side and help him get through this crisis well, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a snake Black in a man’s dream and its meaning. If the man kills the snake after biting him, this is a sign that he will get rid of his worries and problems after losing some things that are important to him. Or it also indicates victory over his enemies who are devising schemes and tragedies against him after a great loss of his mother.

title: Interpretation of the Tashahhud in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we will explain to you what is the interpretation of the Tashahhud in a dream according to what was interpreted by the great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin. In his dream, he feels confused about the interpretation of this vision and wants. The respected scholar has clarified many clues that explain the meaning of this dream. Therefore, we will explain to you through the following paragraphs of the encyclopedia, what is the interpretation of seeing the tashahhud in the dream of an unmarried, married, or pregnant girl. Interpretation of the tashahhud in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar says The great Muhammad ibn Sirin: Seeing the tashahhud in a dream is one of the good visions that carry good connotations. Whoever sees himself in his dream saying the tashahhud, this is a vision that portends the removal of the worries and pains that he suffers from. The interpretation of seeing the tashahhud in a dream is that the dreamer gains reassurance and peace in his life. His dream is that he is reciting the tashahhud, then this is evidence that his money that was stolen from her will be returned. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is completing his prayer and saying the Shahada, then this is a good vision that heralds a good ending for him. And if the dreamer is in a state of impurity while he is sleeping and sees that he is saying the tashahhud in his dream, then this is a sign of... That worries and sorrows will enter his life, so this vision indicates that the dreamer is committing sins and transgressions. The testimony (that there is no god but God and that Muhammad is the Messenger of God) in a dream is a sign of the arrival of a great and blessed provision. Seeing the pronouncement of the Shahada in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s circumstances for the better. Interpretation of the Tashahhud in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she She recites the tashahhud, and she sees that she is praying in a dream, then this is a good vision that indicates that the girl is adorned with good morals and always seeks to please her Lord. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is reciting the tashahhud with another person, then this indicates the soon date of her marriage to a man of religion and morals, because he will be rich. And he spends a happy life with him. Interpretation of the dream of the tashahhud for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is making slander, this is a sign that goodness, blessing, and great living will come in her life. This vision also suggests alleviating circumstances and changing them for the better. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing the tashahhud in a woman’s dream For a married woman, it foretells her of the great goodness that her husband will receive in the near future. If a married woman suffers from the inability to conceive and she sees in her dream that she is bearing witness, then this is a vision that portends her pregnancy in the coming period. Seeing the witness in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is an honorable woman and always defends herself. About the truth. Interpretation of seeing the Tashahhud in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is Tashahhud, then this is a good vision that foretells the imminent birth of her, and that God will give birth to her easily without troubles and troubles. This vision also indicates that her fetus is in good health. Seeing the Tashahhud in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates The arrival of happy news and pleasant events that will arouse in her the joy that awaits her in the coming days. The tashahhud in a dream about a man. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing the tashahhud in a dream for a man has good connotations for him. So they bless him with a lot of goodness and abundant blessed food. Also, seeing the tashahhud in a dream shows
